custom-meta.meta-value: © BioMed Central Ltd., part of Springer Nature 2023

body.p: Following publication of the original article [1], the authors reported that the funding information was mistakenly missed in the manuscript.
The correct funding statement should be:
The study was supported by the European Regional Development Fund - Project ENOCH (No. CZ.02.1.01/0.0/0.0/16_019/0000868).
The original article [1] has been updated.

fn.p: The online version of the original article can be found at 10.1186/s12902-023-01339-w.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
